title: Derivation of the Axiom of Choice

blocks.name: gchaclem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ gchac (obsolete, used in Sierpiński's proof). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm gchaclem(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wbr(c0, cdom, cpw(c1)), wi(wbr(c2, cdom, cpw(cpw(c1))), wbr(cpw(c0), cdom, c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(com, cdom, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cpw(c1), cgch))
  -| wi(w0, wa(wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wi(wbr(c2, cdom, cpw(c1)), wbr(cpw(c0), cdom, c2))))
} = {
  jca(w0, wbr(c0, cdom, cpw(c1)), wi(wbr(c2, cdom, cpw(cpw(c1))), wbr(cpw(c0), cdom, c2)))
  syl2anc(w0, wbr(c0, cdom, cpw(c1)), wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wbr(c1, cdom, cpw(c1)))
  3syl(w0, wbr(c1, cdom, cpw(c1)), wcel(c1, universe), wbr(c1, csdm, cpw(c1)))
  syl(w0, wcel(c1, universe), wbr(c0, cdom, c1))
  brrelex2i(c0, cdom, c1)
  reldom()
  canth2g(c1, universe)
  sdomdom(c1, cpw(c1))
  domtr(c0, c1, cpw(c1))
  syld(w0, wbr(c2, cdom, cpw(cpw(c1))), wbr(cpw(c0), cdom, c2), wo(wbr(cpw(c1), cdom, c2), wbr(c2, cdom, cpw(c1))))
  ex(w0, wbr(c2, cdom, cpw(cpw(c1))), wo(wbr(cpw(c1), cdom, c2), wbr(c2, cdom, cpw(c1))))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wbr(c2, cdom, cpw(cpw(c1)))), wo(wbr(cpw(c1), cdom, c2), wbr(c2, cdom, cpw(c1))), wcel(cpw(c1), cgch), wbr(co(cpw(c1), ccda, cpw(c1)), cen, cpw(c1)), wbr(c2, cdom, cpw(cpw(c1))))
  adantr(w0, wbr(c2, cdom, cpw(cpw(c1))), wcel(cpw(c1), cgch))
  syl(wa(w0, wbr(c2, cdom, cpw(cpw(c1)))), wbr(co(cpw(c1), ccda, cpw(c1)), cen, cpw(c1)), wbr(com, cdom, c1))
  adantr(w0, wbr(c2, cdom, cpw(cpw(c1))), wbr(com, cdom, c1))
  syl2anc(w0, wbr(com, cdom, c1), wbr(com, cdom, c0), wbr(c0, cdom, c1))
  domtr(com, c0, c1)
  pwcdaidm(c1)
  simpr(w0, wbr(c2, cdom, cpw(cpw(c1))))
  gchdomtri(cpw(c1), c2)
  jaod(w0, wbr(cpw(c1), cdom, c2), wbr(c2, cdom, cpw(c1)), wbr(cpw(c0), cdom, c2))
  3syl(w0, wi(wbr(cpw(c1), cdom, c2), wbr(cpw(c0), cdom, c2)), wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wbr(cpw(c0), cdom, cpw(c1)))
  simpld(w0, wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wi(wbr(c2, cdom, cpw(c1)), wbr(cpw(c0), cdom, c2)))
  pwdom(c0, c1)
  ex(wbr(cpw(c0), cdom, cpw(c1)), wbr(cpw(c1), cdom, c2), wbr(cpw(c0), cdom, c2))
  domtr(cpw(c0), cpw(c1), c2)
  simprd(w0, wi(wbr(c2, cdom, cpw(c1)), wbr(cpw(c0), cdom, c2)), wbr(c0, cdom, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm gchaclem(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[‚âº]P(c1)‚àß(c2[‚âº]P(P(c1))‚Üí P(c0)[‚âº]c2)))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí _om[‚âº]c0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí P(c1)‚àà GCH)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[‚âº]c1 ‚àß(c2[‚âº]P(c1)‚Üí P(c0)[‚âº]c2)))
} = {
  jca(w0, c0[‚âº]P(c1), (c2[‚âº]P(P(c1))‚Üí P(c0)[‚âº]c2))
  syl2anc(w0, c0[‚âº]P(c1), c0[‚âº]c1, c1[‚âº]P(c1))
  3syl(w0, c1[‚âº]P(c1), c1 ‚àà ùïå, c1[‚â∫]P(c1))
  syl(w0, c1 ‚àà ùïå, c0[‚âº]c1)
  brrelex2i(c0, cdom, c1)
  reldom()
  canth2g(c1, universe)
  sdomdom(c1, P(c1))
  domtr(c0, c1, P(c1))
  syld(w0, c2[‚âº]P(P(c1)), P(c0)[‚âº]c2, (P(c1)[‚âº]c2 ‚à® c2[‚âº]P(c1)))
  ex(w0, c2[‚âº]P(P(c1)), (P(c1)[‚âº]c2 ‚à® c2[‚âº]P(c1)))
  syl3anc((w0 ‚àß c2[‚âº]P(P(c1))), (P(c1)[‚âº]c2 ‚à® c2[‚âº]P(c1)), P(c1)‚àà GCH, (P(c1)[+]P(c1))[‚âÖ]P(c1), c2[‚âº]P(P(c1)))
  adantr(w0, c2[‚âº]P(P(c1)), P(c1)‚àà GCH)
  syl((w0 ‚àß c2[‚âº]P(P(c1))), (P(c1)[+]P(c1))[‚âÖ]P(c1), _om[‚âº]c1)
  adantr(w0, c2[‚âº]P(P(c1)), _om[‚âº]c1)
  syl2anc(w0, _om[‚âº]c1, _om[‚âº]c0, c0[‚âº]c1)
  domtr(com, c0, c1)
  pwcdaidm(c1)
  simpr(w0, c2[‚âº]P(P(c1)))
  gchdomtri(P(c1), c2)
  jaod(w0, P(c1)[‚âº]c2, c2[‚âº]P(c1), P(c0)[‚âº]c2)
  3syl(w0, (P(c1)[‚âº]c2 ‚Üí P(c0)[‚âº]c2), c0[‚âº]c1, P(c0)[‚âº]P(c1))
  simpld(w0, c0[‚âº]c1, (c2[‚âº]P(c1)‚Üí P(c0)[‚âº]c2))
  pwdom(c0, c1)
  ex(P(c0)[‚âº]P(c1), P(c1)[‚âº]c2, P(c0)[‚âº]c2)
  domtr(P(c0), P(c1), c2)
  simprd(w0, (c2[‚âº]P(c1)‚Üí P(c0)[‚âº]c2), c0[‚âº]c1)
}

blocks.name: gchhar
blocks.content: A "local" form of ~ gchac . If ` A ` and ` ~P A ` are GCH-sets, then the Hartogs number of ` A ` is ` ~P A ` (so ` ~P A ` and a fortiori ` A ` are well-orderable). The proof is due to Specker. Theorem 2.1 of [KanamoriPincus] p. 419. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm gchhar(class c0) {
  |- wi(w3a(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(c0, cgch), wcel(cpw(c0), cgch)), wbr(cfv(char, c0), cen, cpw(c0)))
} = {
  syl2anc(w3a(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(c0, cgch), wcel(cpw(c0), cgch)), wbr(cfv(char, c0), cen, cpw(c0)), wbr(cfv(char, c0), cdom, cpw(c0)), wbr(cpw(c0), cdom, cfv(char, c0)))
  3syl(w3a(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(c0, cgch), wcel(cpw(c0), cgch)), wbr(cpw(c0), cdom, cfv(char, c0)), wbr(cpw(co(c0, ccda, c0)), cen, co(c0, ccda, cfv(char, c0))), wbr(cpw(co(c0, ccda, c0)), cdom, co(c0, ccda, cfv(char, c0))))
  syl2anc(w3a(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(c0, cgch), wcel(cpw(c0), cgch)), wbr(cpw(co(c0, ccda, c0)), cen, co(c0, ccda, cfv(char, c0))), wbr(cpw(co(c0, ccda, c0)), cen, cpw(c0)), wbr(cpw(c0), cen, co(c0, ccda, cfv(char, c0))))
  syl(w3a(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(c0, cgch), wcel(cpw(c0), cgch)), wbr(cpw(co(c0, ccda, c0)), cen, cpw(c0)), wbr(co(c0, ccda, c0), cen, c0))
  syl2anc(w3a(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(c0, cgch), wcel(cpw(c0), cgch)), wbr(co(c0, ccda, c0), cen, c0), wcel(c0, cgch), wn(wcel(c0, cfn)))
  gchcdaidm(c0)
  pwen(co(c0, ccda, c0), c0)
  ensymd(cpw(c0), co(c0, ccda, cfv(char, c0)), w3a(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(c0, cgch), wcel(cpw(c0), cgch)))
  syl22anc(w3a(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(c0, cgch), wcel(cpw(c0), cgch)), wbr(co(c0, ccda, cfv(char, c0)), cen, cpw(c0)), wcel(c0, cgch), wn(wcel(c0, cfn)), wbr(c0, csdm, co(c0, ccda, cfv(char, c0))), wbr(co(c0, ccda, cfv(char, c0)), cdom, cpw(c0)))
  sylanbrc(w3a(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(c0, cgch), wcel(cpw(c0), cgch)), wbr(c0, csdm, co(c0, ccda, cfv(char, c0))), wbr(c0, cdom, co(c0, ccda, cfv(char, c0))), wn(wbr(c0, cen, co(c0, ccda, cfv(char, c0)))))
  sylancl(w3a(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(c0, cgch), wcel(cpw(c0), cgch)), wbr(c0, cdom, co(c0, ccda, cfv(char, c0))), wcel(c0, cgch), wcel(cfv(char, c0), con0))
  cdadom3(c0, cgch, cfv(char, c0), con0)
  mtoi(w3a(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(c0, cgch), wcel(cpw(c0), cgch)), wbr(c0, cen, co(c0, ccda, cfv(char, c0))), wbr(cfv(char, c0), cdom, c0))
  harndom(c0)
  syl5ibrcom(w3a(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(c0, cgch), wcel(cpw(c0), cgch)), wbr(c0, cen, co(c0, ccda, cfv(char, c0))), wbr(cfv(char, c0), cdom, c0), wbr(cfv(char, c0), cdom, co(c0, ccda, cfv(char, c0))))
  sylancl(w3a(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(c0, cgch), wcel(cpw(c0), cgch)), wbr(cfv(char, c0), cdom, co(c0, ccda, cfv(char, c0))), wbr(cfv(char, c0), cdom, co(cfv(char, c0), ccda, c0)), wbr(co(cfv(char, c0), ccda, c0), cen, co(c0, ccda, cfv(char, c0))))
  sylancr(w3a(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(c0, cgch), wcel(cpw(c0), cgch)), wbr(cfv(char, c0), cdom, co(cfv(char, c0), ccda, c0)), wcel(cfv(char, c0), con0), wcel(c0, cgch))
  cdadom3(cfv(char, c0), con0, c0, cgch)
  cdacomen(cfv(char, c0), c0)
  domentr(cfv(char, c0), co(cfv(char, c0), ccda, c0), co(c0, ccda, cfv(char, c0)))
  domen2(c0, co(c0, ccda, cfv(char, c0)), cfv(char, c0))
  brsdom(c0, co(c0, ccda, cfv(char, c0)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(c0, cgch), wcel(cpw(c0), cgch)), wbr(co(c0, ccda, cfv(char, c0)), cdom, cpw(c0)), wbr(co(c0, ccda, cfv(char, c0)), cdom, co(cpw(c0), ccda, cpw(c0))), wbr(co(cpw(c0), ccda, cpw(c0)), cen, cpw(c0)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(c0, cgch), wcel(cpw(c0), cgch)), wbr(co(c0, ccda, cfv(char, c0)), cdom, co(cpw(c0), ccda, cpw(c0))), wbr(co(c0, ccda, cfv(char, c0)), cdom, co(cpw(c0), ccda, cfv(char, c0))), wbr(co(cpw(c0), ccda, cfv(char, c0)), cdom, co(cpw(c0), ccda, cpw(c0))))
  4syl(w3a(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(c0, cgch), wcel(cpw(c0), cgch)), wbr(co(c0, ccda, cfv(char, c0)), cdom, co(cpw(c0), ccda, cfv(char, c0))), wcel(c0, cgch), wbr(c0, csdm, cpw(c0)), wbr(c0, cdom, cpw(c0)))
  canth2g(c0, cgch)
  sdomdom(c0, cpw(c0))
  cdadom1(c0, cpw(c0), cfv(char, c0))
  syl(w3a(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(c0, cgch), wcel(cpw(c0), cgch)), wbr(co(cpw(c0), ccda, cfv(char, c0)), cdom, co(cpw(c0), ccda, cpw(c0))), wbr(cfv(char, c0), cdom, cpw(c0)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(c0, cgch), wcel(cpw(c0), cgch)), wbr(cfv(char, c0), cdom, cpw(c0)), wbr(cfv(char, c0), cdom, co(cfv(char, c0), ccda, cpw(c0))), wbr(co(cfv(char, c0), ccda, cpw(c0)), cen, cpw(c0)))
  sylancr(w3a(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(c0, cgch), wcel(cpw(c0), cgch)), wbr(cfv(char, c0), cdom, co(cfv(char, c0), ccda, cpw(c0))), wcel(cfv(char, c0), con0), wcel(cpw(c0), cgch))
  cdadom3(cfv(char, c0), con0, cpw(c0), cgch)
  ensymd(co(cfv(char, c0), ccda, cpw(c0)), cpw(c0), w3a(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(c0, cgch), wcel(cpw(c0), cgch)))
  sylancl(w3a(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(c0, cgch), wcel(cpw(c0), cgch)), wbr(cpw(c0), cen, co(cfv(char, c0), ccda, cpw(c0))), wbr(cpw(c0), cen, co(cpw(c0), ccda, cfv(char, c0))), wbr(co(cpw(c0), ccda, cfv(char, c0)), cen, co(cfv(char, c0), ccda, cpw(c0))))
  syl22anc(w3a(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(c0, cgch), wcel(cpw(c0), cgch)), wbr(cpw(c0), cen, co(cpw(c0), ccda, cfv(char, c0))), wcel(cpw(c0), cgch), wn(wcel(cpw(c0), cfn)), wbr(cpw(c0), cdom, co(cpw(c0), ccda, cfv(char, c0))), wbr(co(cpw(c0), ccda, cfv(char, c0)), csdm, cpw(cpw(c0))))
  sylancl(w3a(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(c0, cgch), wcel(cpw(c0), cgch)), wbr(cpw(c0), cdom, co(cpw(c0), ccda, cfv(char, c0))), wcel(cpw(c0), cgch), wcel(cfv(char, c0), con0))
  cdadom3(cpw(c0), cgch, cfv(char, c0), con0)
  sylancr(w3a(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(c0, cgch), wcel(cpw(c0), cgch)), wbr(co(cpw(c0), ccda, cfv(char, c0)), csdm, cpw(cpw(c0))), wbr(co(cpw(c0), ccda, cfv(char, c0)), csdm, cpw(co(cpw(c0), ccda, cfv(char, c0)))), wbr(cpw(co(cpw(c0), ccda, cfv(char, c0))), cdom, cpw(cpw(c0))))
  canth2(co(cpw(c0), ccda, cfv(char, c0)))
  ovex(cpw(c0), ccda, cfv(char, c0))
  syl2anc(w3a(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(c0, cgch), wcel(cpw(c0), cgch)), wbr(cpw(co(cpw(c0), ccda, cfv(char, c0))), cdom, cpw(cpw(c0))), wbr(cpw(co(cpw(c0), ccda, cfv(char, c0))), cen, cxp(cpw(cpw(c0)), cpw(cfv(char, c0)))), wbr(cxp(cpw(cpw(c0)), cpw(cfv(char, c0))), cdom, cpw(cpw(c0))))
  sylancl(w3a(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(c0, cgch), wcel(cpw(c0), cgch)), wbr(cpw(co(cpw(c0), ccda, cfv(char, c0))), cen, cxp(cpw(cpw(c0)), cpw(cfv(char, c0)))), wcel(cpw(c0), cgch), wcel(cfv(char, c0), con0))
  harcl(c0)
  pwcdaen(cpw(c0), cgch, cfv(char, c0), con0)
  syl2anc(w3a(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(c0, cgch), wcel(cpw(c0), cgch)), wbr(cxp(cpw(cpw(c0)), cpw(cfv(char, c0))), cdom, cpw(cpw(c0))), wbr(cxp(cpw(cpw(c0)), cpw(cfv(char, c0))), cdom, cxp(cpw(cpw(c0)), cpw(cpw(cxp(c0, c0))))), wbr(cxp(cpw(cpw(c0)), cpw(cpw(cxp(c0, c0)))), cen, cpw(cpw(c0))))
  syl2anc(w3a(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(c0, cgch), wcel(cpw(c0), cgch)), wbr(cxp(cpw(cpw(c0)), cpw(cfv(char, c0))), cdom, cxp(cpw(cpw(c0)), cpw(cpw(cxp(c0, c0))))), wcel(cpw(cpw(c0)), universe), wbr(cpw(cfv(char, c0)), cdom, cpw(cpw(cxp(c0, c0)))))
  pwexd(cpw(c0), cgch, w3a(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(c0, cgch), wcel(cpw(c0), cgch)))
  3syl(w3a(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(c0, cgch), wcel(cpw(c0), cgch)), wbr(cpw(cfv(char, c0)), cdom, cpw(cpw(cxp(c0, c0)))), wcel(c0, cgch), wbr(cfv(char, c0), cwdom, cpw(cxp(c0, c0))))
  harwdom(c0, cgch)
  wdompwdom(cfv(char, c0), cpw(cxp(c0, c0)))
  xpdom2g(cpw(cpw(c0)), universe, cpw(cfv(char, c0)), cpw(cpw(cxp(c0, c0))))
  syl2anc(w3a(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(c0, cgch), wcel(cpw(c0), cgch)), wbr(cxp(cpw(cpw(c0)), cpw(cpw(cxp(c0, c0)))), cen, cpw(cpw(c0))), wbr(cxp(cpw(cpw(c0)), cpw(cpw(cxp(c0, c0)))), cen, cpw(co(cpw(c0), ccda, cpw(cxp(c0, c0))))), wbr(cpw(co(cpw(c0), ccda, cpw(cxp(c0, c0)))), cen, cpw(cpw(c0))))
  ensymd(cxp(cpw(cpw(c0)), cpw(cpw(cxp(c0, c0)))), cpw(co(cpw(c0), ccda, cpw(cxp(c0, c0)))), w3a(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(c0, cgch), wcel(cpw(c0), cgch)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(c0, cgch), wcel(cpw(c0), cgch)), wbr(cpw(co(cpw(c0), ccda, cpw(cxp(c0, c0)))), cen, cxp(cpw(cpw(c0)), cpw(cpw(cxp(c0, c0))))), wcel(cpw(c0), cgch), wcel(cpw(cxp(c0, c0)), universe))
  pwexd(cxp(c0, c0), universe, w3a(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(c0, cgch), wcel(cpw(c0), cgch)))
  xpexd(c0, c0, cgch, cgch, w3a(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(c0, cgch), wcel(cpw(c0), cgch)))
  pwcdaen(cpw(c0), cgch, cpw(cxp(c0, c0)), universe)
  syl(w3a(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(c0, cgch), wcel(cpw(c0), cgch)), wbr(cpw(co(cpw(c0), ccda, cpw(cxp(c0, c0)))), cen, cpw(cpw(c0))), wbr(co(cpw(c0), ccda, cpw(cxp(c0, c0))), cen, cpw(c0)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(c0, cgch), wcel(cpw(c0), cgch)), wbr(co(cpw(c0), ccda, cpw(cxp(c0, c0))), cen, cpw(c0)), wbr(co(cpw(c0), ccda, cpw(cxp(c0, c0))), cen, co(cpw(c0), ccda, cpw(c0))), wbr(co(cpw(c0), ccda, cpw(c0)), cen, cpw(c0)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(c0, cgch), wcel(cpw(c0), cgch)), wbr(co(cpw(c0), ccda, cpw(cxp(c0, c0))), cen, co(cpw(c0), ccda, cpw(c0))), wbr(cpw(c0), cen, cpw(c0)), wbr(cpw(cxp(c0, c0)), cen, cpw(c0)))
  syl(w3a(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(c0, cgch), wcel(cpw(c0), cgch)), wbr(cpw(c0), cen, cpw(c0)), wcel(cpw(c0), cgch))
  enrefg(cpw(c0), cgch)

blocks.name: gchacg
blocks.content: A "local" form of ~ gchac . If ` A ` and ` ~P A ` are GCH-sets, then ` ~P A ` is well-orderable. The proof is due to Specker. Theorem 2.1 of [KanamoriPincus] p. 419. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-May-2015.)

blocks.name: gchac
blocks.content: The Generalized Continuum Hypothesis implies the Axiom of Choice. The original proof is due to Sierpiński (1947); we use a refinement of Sierpiński's result due to Specker. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm gchac() {
  |- wi(wceq(cgch, universe), wac)
} = {
  sylibr(wceq(cgch, universe), wac, wceq(cdm(ccrd), universe))
  eqrdv(hs0, cdm(ccrd), universe, wceq(cgch, universe))
  2thd(wceq(cgch, universe), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(ccrd)), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  sylancl(wceq(cgch, universe), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(ccrd)), wcel(cun(cv(hs0), com), cdm(ccrd)), wss(cv(hs0), cun(cv(hs0), com)))
  sylancl(wceq(cgch, universe), wcel(cun(cv(hs0), com), cdm(ccrd)), wcel(cpw(cun(cv(hs0), com)), cdm(ccrd)), wbr(cun(cv(hs0), com), cdom, cpw(cun(cv(hs0), com))))
  mp3an2i(wceq(cgch, universe), wcel(cpw(cun(cv(hs0), com)), cdm(ccrd)), wbr(com, cdom, cun(cv(hs0), com)), wcel(cun(cv(hs0), com), cgch), wcel(cpw(cun(cv(hs0), com)), cgch))
  mp2(wbr(com, cdom, cun(cv(hs0), com)), wcel(cun(cv(hs0), com), universe), wss(com, cun(cv(hs0), com)))
  ssun2(com, cv(hs0))
  ssdomg(cun(cv(hs0), com), universe, com)
  syl5eleqr(cun(cv(hs0), com), cgch, universe, wceq(cgch, universe))
  syl5eleqr(cpw(cun(cv(hs0), com)), cgch, universe, wceq(cgch, universe))
  pwex(cun(cv(hs0), com))
